\subsection*{Additional Inherited Members}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
This class uses the basic\-C\-R\-U\-D class to handle the vast majority of the administration of database entries. This class will provide coverage of the majority of entry administration tasks and can then be extended as needed for more specific cases.
